events.message: The claimant reported an auto accident involving their sedan and a roadside barrier on March 31. Initial details and required documents were submitted.
The insurance claim was categorised under Auto Accident after confirming the reported incident involved vehicle collision.
An agent specializing in vehicle claims was assigned to handle the case and to assist the claimant throughout the process.
The claimant received acknowledgment of their auto accident claim submission along with initial instructions on next steps.
The claims team requested additional documents, including police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates for thorough investigation.
Claimant uploaded and submitted all requested documents promptly to facilitate faster processing of the auto accident claim.
The investigation into the auto accident claim began, focusing on verifying accident details, vehicle damage, and liability analysis.
The investigation was completed successfully with no discrepancies found, confirming the claimant's account and damage assessments.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and related expenses was proposed to the claimant based on investigation results.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and praised the timely communication and professionalism of the claims team.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance company based on claimant acceptance of the settlement terms.
The agreed settlement payment was issued successfully to the claimantâ€™s designated bank account for vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirming payment and closure formalities with the claimant.
